alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 6:44PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Mendocino and south Humboldt through 715 PM PST... At 641 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm south of Shelter Cove, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Richardson Grove State Park, Leggett, Richardson Grove and Piercy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
